title: Biscoito
typeOfFood: Raw, Mediterranean, Fast food, Salad bar, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, European, Fusion, Middle Eastern, Portugese, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A cozy place that exhibits arts and crafts, teaches ceramics, painting and drawing. Some vegan and/or vegetarian items are a hummus sandwich, Mediterranean cooked mushrooms, vegetables bruschetta, couscous salad with fruits and tofu and juices.
